LanguageData.VFES_Turret_MilitaryTurret.description: A military-grade double barreled automatic turret. Requires industrial ammo to reload. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_FloorTurret.description: A submersible military-grade double barreled automatic turret which acts as a normal floor tile when unpowered. It only takes half as much damage when submerged. Requires industrial ammo to reload. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_AutocannonDouble.description: A heavy automatic turret enhanced with 2 barrels. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over significant ranges, but it must be rearmed after use. It cannot fire at close-up targets, and may explode when damaged.
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_ChargeTurret.description: An automatic turret with a charge pulser gun on top, utilising advanced sensors which offer improved accuracy. Requires charged shot ammo to reload. May explode when damaged.
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_ChargeComplex.description: A stationary charge cannon mounted on a metal barrier. Capable of sustaining fire until it needs rearmed.
